comments.author: Dave
comments.body: It was cold this weekend, but not too cold to take the family down to see the traveling carnival in the Sam's Club parking lot. They had the usual assortment of squeaky, stomach-churning rides and threadbare oddities of nature in canvas huts. Standard-issue stuff to be sure; I'd seen it all a thousand times before. It was one of the "skill booths" that really got my attention. We'd already worked our way through the ring toss and the paddle-ball arcades when we came to this particular beauty. It looked easy enough at first, so I decided to give it a shot. But it was no cakewalk. If you think the bobbing ducks in the marksman's arcade are tough to hit, you should have seen this [thing.](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nAGdsoaZUyE) I was determined to win a cupie doll or a stuffed polar bear for the kids, but after going through a full stack of quarters I realized I simply didn't have the chops. I didn't hit the damned thing even once. I felt like a total heel and the kids pouted all the way home. SB and I are doing Flag today, right SB? DU
